NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ IN 13-33.28N 043-09.16W
AT 111542Z OCT. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
